name: PoliceSiren
0:
”Alexa, open Police Siren”
”Alexa, start Police Siren”
”Alexa, play Police Siren”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: police siren
des:
Make somebody's day with this police siren. 

Wake the wife, play with the kids, or trick your friends. 

Just say "Alexa, open Police Siren". 

You can stop it with "Alexa, stop Police Siren" - remember to prefix that with 'Alexa' ! 

"Go ahead, make my day."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
